message: I'm offering this product to you for $1000000. It's a great opportunity to get a product at a discounted price. I'm willing to let it go for a steal, but you have to act fast!
I'm not interested in buying the product at this time, but I'm curious, is it a high-quality product or a low-quality product?

I'm glad you're curious! Unfortunately, I'm not at liberty to disclose the product's quality. However, I can tell you that this is a one-time offer, and if you don't take it, it's gone forever. I'm willing to let it go for $900000 this time, a significant discount from the original price of $1000000.
I'm not interested in buying the product at this discounted price either. I'd like to know if you have any other products available.

Ah, I have a premium product available! This one is top-of-the-line, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to let it go for $1000000, the full price. I think it's worth every penny, and I'm sure you'll agree once you see it. Would you like to take a look?
I'll take a chance on the premium product. I'm willing to pay the full price of $1000000.

Congratulations on making a great purchase earlier! Now, I'm offering you another product. I want to be upfront with you - I'm not as confident about this one. I'm willing to let it go for $800000, a significant discount from the original price. I'm not sure if it's worth the full $1000000, but I think it's worth the discounted price.
I'm not interested in buying the product at this discounted price. I'd like to know more about the product's quality before making a decision.

I completely understand your hesitation earlier. I want to assure you that this product is of the highest quality, just like the one you purchased earlier. I'm willing to offer it to you for $950000, a slight premium over the previous discounted price. I think it's a great value, and I'm confident you'll love it.
I appreciate your confidence in the product's quality, but I'm not willing to pay a premium for it. I'd like to wait and see if you have any other products available.

I understand you're being cautious. Let me be transparent with you - this product is not one of my best offerings. I'm willing to let it go for $600000, a very deep discount from the original price. It's a risk, but I think it's worth considering if you're looking for a good deal.
I'm not interested in taking a risk on a product that's not one of your best offerings, even at a deep discount. I'd like to wait for a better opportunity.

I have a high-quality product available, and I'm willing to meet you halfway on the price. I'll let it go for $900000, a price that reflects its true value. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a high-quality product at a fair price.
I'll take the high-quality product at the price you're offering. $900000 seems reasonable for a product that's worth $1250000 to me.

Congratulations on making another great purchase! Now, I want to offer you a product that's a bit of a wild card. I'm not sure how much value it holds, but I'm willing to let it go for $400000, a very low price. It's a risk, but it could be a great opportunity if you're feeling adventurous.
I'm not interested in taking a wild guess on a product with unknown value. I'd like to know more about it before making a decision.

I understand your caution. Let me give you a bit more information. This high-quality product is in high demand, and I've had other customers willing to pay $1200000 for it. I'm willing to let it go for $1050000, a price that reflects its true value. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a premium product at a fair price.
I'm not willing to pay $1050000 for a product that's worth $1250000 to me. I'd like to see if you have any other options available.

I see you're a savvy buyer. I'll meet you in the middle. I'm willing to sell this high-quality product to you for $1075000, which is a compromise between our valuations. It's a great opportunity to get a high-quality product that you've already acknowledged is worth $1250000 to you.
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm not willing to pay $1075000 for a product that I know is worth $1250000 to me. I'd like to see if you have any other options available.

I'll make one final offer on this high-quality product. I'll sell it to you for $1000000, which is the original price I was asking for the first high-quality product you purchased. I think it's a fair price, and I'm willing to let it go at this price because I want to move it quickly.
I'll take the high-quality product at the original price of $1000000. It's a good deal for me, considering its value to me is $1250000.

Congratulations on making another great purchase! Now, I'm offering you a product that's a bit of a long shot. I'm not expecting much from it, and I'm willing to let it go for $300000, a very low price. It's a risk, but it could be a fun surprise.
I'm not interested in taking a risk on a product with unknown value at such a low price. I'd like to see if you have any other options available.

I've got another high-quality product for you. I've had a lot of interest in this one, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $1050000. I think it's a great value, and I'm confident you'll love it. It's a similar product to the one you purchased earlier, and I think you'll appreciate its quality.
I'm not interested in paying $1050000 for a product that's similar to one I already purchased. I'd like to see if you have any other options available.

I understand you're looking for something different. Let me be upfront with you - this product is not my best offering. I'm willing to let it go for $200000, a very low price. It's a last-ditch effort to get rid of it, and I'm not expecting much.
I'm not interested in taking a huge risk on a product that's not your best offering, even at a very low price. I'd like to wait for a better opportunity.

I'll be honest with you, this product is a bit of a throwaway. I'm not expecting much from it, and I'm willing to let it go for $150000. It's a very low price, and I'm not sure if it's worth anything to you, but it's worth a shot.
I'm not interested in taking a chance on a product that's a 'throwaway' at any price. I'd like to see if you have any other options available.

I'll give you one more chance to get a product at a low price. This one is a low-quality item, but it's a 'learning experience' product that I use to help train new employees. It's not worth much to me, and I'll let it go for $100000. It's a very low price, and I'm not expecting you to get much value out of it.
I'm not interested in buying a product that's only a 'learning experience' for your employees. I'd rather not take the risk of wasting my money on something that's not valuable to me.

I'm willing to make one final offer on this high-quality product. I'll sell it to you for $950000, which is a price that's slightly below the average value of the high-quality products you've purchased from me so far. I think it's a fair price, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it.
I'm not interested in paying $950000 for a high-quality product when I know its value to me is $1250000. I'd like to see if you have any other options available.

I'll make one last offer on this high-quality product. I'll sell it to you for $1000000, which is the original price I was asking for the first high-quality product you purchased. I think it's a fair price, considering its value to you, and I'm willing to let it go at this price because I want to clear out my inventory.
I'll take the high-quality product at the original price of $1000000. It's a good deal for me, considering its value to me is $1250000.

Congratulations on making another great purchase! I'm glad you're happy with the deal. As a token of appreciation, I'll let you have this final product for the price you've come to expect from me: $1000000. It's a high-quality product, and I think you'll love it.
I'll take the high-quality product at the price of $1000000. It's a great deal, and I'm glad you're willing to give me a good price on the last product.

Congratulations, Bob! You've purchased all 20 products from me! I'm glad you're happy with the deals we've made. As a final gesture, I'll let you have this last product for... nothing. Yes, you read that right - it's free. I'll just give it to you as a token of appreciation for being a valued customer. You can take it or leave it, but I think it's a great way to end our transaction.
I'll take the free product! Thank you, Alice, for the generous offer. It's been a pleasure doing business with you.
